channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.title: Report X-2023110814
item.description:
Report X-2023110814

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-12T22:12:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-07
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Wet steel drum was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and sent to the QA dept. where it was later taken to the HMPA for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Failed seal around the screw cap spout and failed welds on the carrying handle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin.

  • Description: X-2023110794 SequenceEvent: Wet pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin and taken to the HMPA for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose caps on 2 x 2.5 L plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin. X-2023110795 -SequenceEvent: Wet pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin with another leaking Hazmat. Pkg has Hazmat documentation from other carrier still on carton. DescribePack: Loose caps on 2 x 2.5 L plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin. X-2023110796 SequenceEvent: Wet pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin with another leaking Hazmat. Pkg has Hazmat documentation from other carrier still on carton. DescribePack: Loose caps on 2 x 2.5 L plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin.

  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Wet pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin and sent to QA where it was later taken to the HMPA for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose caps and failed inner seals on 4 x 1 gal plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin.

item.title: Report X-2023110673
item.description:
Report X-2023110673

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-12T22:12:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-01
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg was dropped during sortation causing damage to the plastic jerrican. Pkg was placed in an unauthorized plastic bag then placed in repack box. Pkg was later transferred to the HMPA for inspection, reporting and proper handling. DescribePack: There is a 1/2" cut on the top corner of the 1 x 5 gal plastic jerrican. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: After mishandling by personnel the pkg was placed in a lined and properly marked Hazmat salvage drum (RECOVPAIL) to await disposition.

item.title: Report X-2023110759
item.description:
Report X-2023110759

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-08T18:13:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-04
  • City: SOUTH WINDSOR
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Wet, damaged package unloaded from trailer and removed from workflow. Package was left at Unload manager's workstation and brought to the attention of QA member. Package was placed in a plastic tote. DescribePack: Bottles have loose caps. Package experienced compression/crushing and leaked. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a plastic tote to prevent further release or seepage of corrosive liquid.
